mapper.select: SELECT users.userId, users.userName, users.userPwd, roles.roleName AS `level`, users.realName FROM users INNER JOIN user_role ON users.userId = user_role.userId INNER JOIN roles ON user_role.roleId = roles.roleId WHERE users.userName = #{userName} AND users.userPwd = #{userPwd}

SELECT users.userId, users.userName, users.userPwd, roles.roleName, users.realName FROM users INNER JOIN user_role ON users.userId = user_role.userId INNER JOIN roles ON user_role.roleId = roles.roleId WHERE users.isDeleted = 0 limit #{index},#{size}
